title: Indian-origin woman in England loses all four limbs after dog lick leads to sepsis: 'How did this happen in 24 hours?'
summary_full: A Birmingham woman’s life was changed forever when a dog’s lick on a small cut led to a life-threatening sepsis infection. The 56-year-old endured multiple cardiac arrests and quadruple limb amputations.
summary_public: A Birmingham woman’s life was changed forever when a dog’s lick on a small cut led to a life-threatening sepsis infection. The 56-year-old endured multiple cardiac arrests and quadruple limb amputations.
source: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
